reviews.review:
I started playing this game back at 2017 and a lot of new contents has been added. The game is really fun to play despite all the bugs and gameplay issues. Below is the list of what makes the game barely playable due to bugs.

- Broken SFW lobby, random disconnect while searching match
- Broken matchmaking (high rank players being paired with low rank killers/ vice versa)
- Random DCs when loading a game
- Unpolished and laggy dedicated servers 
- Broken hitboxes
- Infinite pallet loops

List of what I like:
- DBD's fun gameplay, replayability and progression system
- Content updates

I'll give it a 5/10 overall.
This game is really glichy but really fun
Really good game, some lags but really fun to play.
this game is fun BUT why would you ruin David and Felix's faces how dare you and I HATE TRICKSTER now gj dbd
这游戏刚出来的时候我就在玩，确实挺好玩的好吧，可惜太血腥被广电禁了而且时间和吃鸡有点冲突，导致这游戏过气，过气是过气了，但是没尝试过的人可以买这款游戏玩玩

Плюсы: разнообразие маньяков, небольшая цена, возможность игры с друзьями, окружение делают игровой процесс воистину незабываемым. Частые обновления и добавления в игру новых вещей не дают заскучать.

Минусы: комьюнити. Весь поднимаемый шум по поводу неиграбельности Dead by Daylight происходит именно из-за части игроков. Они не умеют проигрывать, не желают понять других игроков, тем самым портя раунд и игру. Баланс тоже оставляет желать лучшего - к высшему рангу может попасть низший, и наоборот. Ну и вишенкой на торте- использование маньяка и его ПК как хост-сервер для раунда. Некоторые умные хосты намеренно понижают качество соединения в игре, чтобы упростить себе жизнь, что тоже не красит игру. Баги, незначительные и чаще всего возникающие по вине багоюзеров, не портящие игровой процесс, но всё же баги.

Общий итог: со стороны разработчика всё выполнено в лучшем виде, игра развивается и не забывается после первых 20-50 часов, проведённых в ней. Всё остальное возложено на игроков, на их отношение к миру игры. Игра определённо стоит своих денег, позволяет отрешиться от реального мира с его проблемами и погрузиться в Атмосферу. Именно с большой буквы, ведь ради Атмосферы и создана Dead by Daylight.
gg ez
good game tks

Dead by Daylight was a game I could play with my friends and just pass time while having some fun, obviously since I am playing with friends I am typically playing the game as a survivor. This game is always very repetitive with the only changes being map decor and killer tactics, there was always very little in the way of variation, but it worked for Dead by Daylight.
The emblem change was a fantastic idea in that you get credited based on your preformance, rather than just shoving your in game currency and rank into one mechanic. However, coming from being a fairly decent survivor in the past, now unless you play selfishly and decide to absolutely screw over your teamates you will only get a safety pip (if any). There have been games where I have rescued all survivors off of the hooks and done all but one generator solo but still didn't get a pip towards ranking up. The game punished survivor mains when its a 4-1 ratio to be able to play the game. If a killer leaves the survivors get punished, if a survivor leaves the killer gets a quitter bonus. This leads to survivors being hard stuck at rank 16-20 while killers can pip just by playing the game while survivors have to try-hard and play selfishly to get anything.
With this theres killer mains who can decide to face camp, which literally prevents survivors from being able to get altruism points throughout the game. This also prevents pipping uip, and the killer can still rank up while face camping. This game is catering to the 20% (the killers) and is making it not even worth playing if you want to be a survivor.

If you want a game you can feel accomplished in, main killer and never touch survivor.

This game was honestly a super fun game. I enjoyed playing as the survivor as well as killer. However, with all these new updates it completely ruined the game. It's so one sided and unbalanced it super stressful and that's really dissapointing. With all the new killer perks it completely ruins the the stealth portion of the game, and you can't do much else. You can't outrun the killer because, depsite what anyone says, the killers ARE infact, faster. The killer's also seem to think that it's unfair that the survivors can even run at all, no matter how bad you nerf the survivors it's never enough, and I think the game develpers are listening to the wrong people. This game is no fun at all anymore.
dlc随便出，你出我就买，真的很好

A cliche with a learning curve. DBD takes the whole killer concept with both the grueling task and worthwhile reward of escape. You have a choice to survive the horrors or be the horror. The question is, who survives and who dies?

Do not buy this game. This game has developers who actively disregard the opinions of the community. The ego on these devs to think that every decision they make is gold and everyone else just doesn't know better. Claiming that a small update every 1.5 months is a "break neck pace". They actively lie to the community and make ridiculous excuses to divert the uninformed away from the problems that plague this game.

As a long time member of this community I simply say this. Don't buy this game until the devs fix these problems. Now I don't mean buffing or nerfing anything in particular. I mean fixing the communication issues that allow for two completely different responses to come out on if people will get banned for a visual bug. Fixing the ignorance they have to the communities hatred of the new Hud. Fixing the lies they spew about how they "want to see how console players like the Hud" or that they can't ever bring back the old Hud because they "changed it on the back end" which means they would've literally deleted every previous version of the game for no reason. Fixing the process by which you make changes at all, by simply having a small team of trusted community members that can give ideas and feedback on changes. (which you already have a program like that it's called your FOG WHISPERS, but you never let them give feedback so what's the point anyway?). And fixing the staff like Almo, who actively insulted and ignored colorblind players, causing the company to panic and go on massive damage control.

This all frustrates me because I know these devs can do great things, but with no competitions pushing them to do better they have no incentive to improve of listen. So now more than ever we as a community needs to make are voice heard and tell the devs this one simple sentence.

This is ridiculous, and it needs to change.
Gets boring after a while.
wedwqsdqesdwasd

So all in all this game is unbalanced and trash.

tl/dr: buy the game if you wana play as a survivor, cause its easy times for you m8. Dont buy it if you wana play as a killer.

What I expected as a survivor:
Me hiding in terror so the killer wont find me and hope he finds someone else, while i put my fingers in to a generator and magic happens and i get a chance to escape.

What I got as a survivor:
After about 20+ youtube vids and about 2-3 hours of game time i blinded killers to save others, i pallet looped them for ages and tbagged my way out of most of the games where i didnt get a dc-ed survivor as a teammate or if I didnt get a hardcore god killer main (cause f**k good Nurses), 

What I expected as a killer:
Me running around and causing terror and havok, killing survivors not letting anyone escape.

What I got:
15 minutes of chasing, getting blinded, no progress in any way and just no fun at all.

Wana play this game, only play as a survivor, they got it easy in this game:

You can run faster than the killer, you get to blind them, you get to jump off the shoulders of said killers cause you got a perk, you can run around a bloody box, not get hit and once the killer gets near to you, you get to slam a pallet on them, tbag em, then run to the next box/window/whatever trash that you can run around and have a pallet near it and repeat the whole bloody thing for basicly 90% of the game, while the other 3 survivors do the borring stuff of fixing generators, clearing totems and opening doors for you to escape.

Out of the 78 hours i played about 20 of em was with survivors and i got every perk i needed, cause i made a ton of points from mostly winning games. The rest of the time i played as a killer and got nothing. With 30 hours i got to play against 500-1,2k hour guys (cause thats fair) and got rekt so hard i sometimes thought i was getting negative points at the end of the game.

What you can get as a survivor:
sprint burst (run faster than the killer for a short durration)
borrowed time (give a free get out of jail card to a hooked survivor)
dstrike (get out of jail card for you)
lithe (jump over a window and run faster than the killer)
adrenaline (last generator fixed, you heal instantly and run faster than the killer)
self care (self heal)
tons of palets, windows to run around, loop throu em and have a fun chase with the killer.
flashlights, when your dstrike or loops or windows or hiding or pallets fail you.
tbag killers

What you get as a killer:
you can chase the players... (once you find them)
you can hit the players... (once there are no pallets or windows around and once you caught up with them)
you can kill the players... (once you hit them 2 times, got them to a hook and repeated this 2 more times)

ps: Dont you even try to camp as a killer, cause how dare you take away the fun from the survivors, those special snowflakes, and have one kill in the game while 3 of them will make more points and get to level up, while you as a camper wont level, wont make any points.

Twins are the best addition to the game I am so happy that they exist just running around as Victor gives me the biggest smile. Honestly bestest game to buy but only if you buy twins too because they are just so cool. Victor is really small and he can jump.... high. And if you are Charolette (THEY ARE TWINS) then you can hit them with your very big sickle and it will....hurt.them. Whenever I am not playing dead by daylight I always think about running around as Victor and riding the survivors backs. It was so sad playing this game before their existence and I honestly don't know how I functioned without them. Now all I can do is play Twins and smile and have fun. Not only do I have the mostest fun I also win a largerest amount of game. This is due to me having good mentalality . Because if you don't have a good metality then you will suck and sucking is only for bad people who do bad things. Anyways friends I am hoping you found my review/rant very helpful.

Half a year ago, I was recommending this game, now I just can't anymore.

+ concept/idea of 4vs1; survivors have to repair gens to escape a killer
+ multiple perks and characters
+ fun with friends
+ soundtrack + graphics are lovely (not the absolute best, but still amazing)
+ anything can happen, no match feels the same
+ you can improve in time



Ok, seems a good game. But why then a negative review?

There is NO interest of the developers to listen to the community and you feel that:

- unbalanced matches and mechanics (some killers are way too strong, others too weak)
- matchmaking is not really fitting your rank
- EVERY Update/Patch is causing more troubles than it fixes (especially new content: they had to take off the map of the Raccoon City Police Station for several WEEKS; at the moment many players are facing FPS-drops, but no Hotfix, etc.)
- Releasing NEW content instead of fixing the old one --> MONEY, MONEY, MONEY
- NO practice mode; you have a tutorial, but all is scripted. You can't choose your survivor or perk to try out. You HAVE to play online.
- NO unranked public playlist.
- Toxic community. Survivors trolling noob killers and killer face-camping survivors. No fun at all.
- But therefore we have censored chat that is filtering basically every word that COULD insult someone (noob is already censored as ****)

MY RECOMMENDATION: Just buy if you have 4 friends that also play. Private matches are fun since you make the rules, but a public one is not acceptable. Also due to crashes which will give you a minimum penalty of 5 mins.
Dead by Daylight is a very fun game with friends. I play it almost every day, but there are still a ton of bugs.

Отыграл 650 часов, игра пережила не мало взлетов и падений, в общем было положительное впечатление, до последней обновы где должны были поправить баланс и исправить баги! В общем вырезали ауру которая была идеальна, но теперь она "вырви глаз" в месте с аурой выпали и навыки маньяков связанные с аурой! баланс лопнул окончательно! все паблики пистрят скринами где играет ман (20) против 4 сурвов (1-4 ранг) и наоборот. У половины комьюнити выходит ошибка 111 из-за которой не начисляют очки крови и еще кучу багов! Обнову нужно полностью откатить. Я играю в игру около 2 лет и так жестко игра еще не обсиралась!

I've played this game for a couple months now.  When I started it was fun, but the more I've gotten into it the more monotonous it is and the community is purely toxic.  You have a bunch a people who only want to play survivor and a bunch of people playing killer and both sides are screaming at each other about how unfair the other side has it in terms of tweaks to the game.  

The biggest flaw I'm finding right now is that you have killers camping survivors that they hooked, moreso since they implemented the emblem system.  It makes the game excrutiatingly boring.  Assuming you don't want to screw over your team, if you're hooked you're just sitting there, staring at the killer.  If someone else is hooked and camped, you're just performing endless skill checks on gens with no one chasing you.  

If I could get my money back, I would.

Игра прикольная и интересная, но она скатывается и многие игроки покидают её.  Разработчики вместо того, чтобы как-то привлечь новых игроков или же заработать больше денег, банят старых игроков без предупреждения, не на время, например на месяц, а навсегда, и причину бана не скажут, как будто её нет. Так же были забанены 2 моих друга и всё так же без причины. Если короче, то если вам игра очень понравилась и месяцами задротите только в неё, то ждите бана, чтобы купить игру снова.
Есть ещё причины, почему игру я не рекомендую. Во-первых очень долгое ожидание в лобби. Если вы решили сыграть за убийцу, то советую приготовить чай или что-нибудь поесть, так как ждать выживших придётся очень долго (на рангах 20-10, иногда было и на 9-6). Если вы не хотите играть за убицу, значит придётся готовить систему охлаждения для заднего прохода, так как в игре много д**илов (Кемперы, фейс кемперы, лагсвитчеры - особые дегенераты общества, которые ни как не дадут вам выйграть). Во-вторых баги, множество багов в этой игре. Например: был и есть баг с решающим ударом персонажа Лори Строуд, когда вы 10 раз попали по нужной зоне в проверке реакции, но ничего не произошло. Или уже новый баг с перком Адама Френсиса "Освобождение", когда ты безопасно снял человека с крюка и у тебя засветился перк, то с ним сам должен без помощи других выживших слезть с крюка, но это же DbD, на каждой игре перк будет включаться, но сам ты слезь не сможешь, никогда. И ещё 1 баг, который сюществует в DbD очень давно - это "3 чела в лобби". Когда в лобби убийцы сидят 3 выживших и ждут 4, но 4-й не зайдёт, он просто не сможет попасть в это лобби.

mt bom

In its present form, I do not recommend Dead By Daylight.

The developers have instituted a massive change with the addition of emblems and it is NOT a good change. You can recognize that by the amount of low rank people you now see. I can't remember the last time I came across anyone with a rank beyond level 15. Prior to the update I saw a variety of ranks but now it's basically all 17-20. That should tell you that either the entirety of your playerbase is really bad...OR...your scoring system is absurd. I'll side with the latter.

The survivor side is ludicrous! Why should I have to intentionally expose myself to the killer or stay in their radius to get points towards an emblem that affects my rank? I should be skillfully evading the killer around the map and focusing on objectives! I've completed 3 gens before and still only received a Silver ranking for Lightbringer...WTF!? This new ranking system is totally flawed - especially for survivors. This is coming from someone who never pallet loops or uses map advantages against the killer..I run, I try to break line of sight and hide - the way the game is intended to be played. I'll admit I'm not that great - but by playing the game the proper way (ie. not exploiting)  I still would manage to at least get to rank 16. Now I can't even get off 20.

As another reviewer pointed out, this game is balanced poorly. The killer has an awful time playing, especially against people on Survive With Friends mode. One person can lead the killer around over and over in a circle and barely get caught, while everyone else does gens. If the killer leaves that person to go try to find the others, then that person will run off to do a gen. So it's lose/lose. The game, at present, when looking objectively, makes survivors more powerful than killers and that simply makes no sense when it's 4v1. The only killer who I'd say has a great chance at map control and keeping pressure on survivors is the Nurse and she is considered a difficult killer.

Until changes are made, this game will continue to suffer and the community will leave. So I suggest fixing things properly - adjust the balance so that survivors can't exploit the map and pallet loop/infinite without consequence. Consider removing SWF or making it a mode that is not for ranking, because there is no way to ensure outside comms are not being used (this game was intended to be about feeling isolated and unable to communicate with people beyond the 2 gestures provided). If something isn't done soon, it might be too late and by the time you make changes your community will be gone and won't give you the undeserved second chance. Having put money in for the original game as well as 4 DLC, I feel ripped off, to be honest.

The generators will be done by the time you manage to down someone if you are playing under rank 15. The only fun I can have right now is playing killer at rank 15+ or surviors. So if you plan to buy this game, be ready to get frustrated and flamed in chat when you play killer.

It is so sad. My wife and I play this game all the time. However, after the update this game has become so frustratingly boring. You can't really play as a team anymore. You just got to play as an individual. Honestly I'd rather just eat McDonalds apple pies. I ate like 6 already and feel terrible, but at least I'm happier eating these apple pies then playing this game. Thanks Riot.

Non skill based game, players in this game are pretty much casuals and boosted to high ranks.

Survivors just walk around and hide the entire match. One heartbeat and they start running like headless chickens, wasting every single pallet they can find, for the rest of us to be left with nothing after their mere 10 second chase.
Killers camp the first person they get and they gloat often, like they did a big deal by staring at the hook all game. They just don't know any better.

The report system is worthless. Unless you're some developer's cousin, they don't care about your complaint. They will just laugh and call you "toxic kid" behind the screen - Confirmed by one of their old devs.
There's a lot of cheaters in this game at the moment, with flying, speedhack, infinite flashlight, instant generator, instant healing, auto-unhook, teleport, etc. Don't waste time sending video proof because the devs don't even bother to check them. 

Game director's own words - [i][b]"Play something else."[/b] ✌️

Проведя в данной помойке уже не мало времени могу сказать со 100% уверенностью что оно того не стоило, но сейчас не об этом. Игра явно развивается и выходит много качественного и интересного контента (Маньяки, сурвы, карты, архивы, скины)  фиксится много багов (иногда), добавили кросс-плей и теперь можно  играть с друзьями с других платформ. Всё что я ещё жду от данной игры это Джейсона Вурхиза (не знаю как они это сделают но его не хватает в семье сущьности), кросс-сейвы (что бы мог играть со своего  аккаунта на консолях а не только с  друзьями от туда) и более проработанную систему рангов.  Сейчас ранги показывают только на сколько долго ты играешь в игру а не скил. Её   пытались добавить но видимо что то пошло не так. Жду с нетерпением обновлённой графики которую обещали завести к концу 2020. Всем рекомендую но у игры достаточно высокий порог входа!
ㅗ
I love this and i hate this? :/

Игру купил в августе 17-го года. Игра интересна,но есть весьма серьезный недостаток. Я не буду говорить про баги,комьюнити, так это уже давно все обсосали. Этот недостаток в некотором роде однотипности. Да, карт много разных. Да,маньяки разные и везде нужны разные стратегии и подходы. Но чем ниже ранг(ранговая система от 20-го до 1-го), тем все сильнее играть не хочется. Будь у тебя даже фулл пати 24 на 7. Все равно заебет. Дело в однотипности. Маньяки на высоких рангах одни и те же. С перками в аддонами такая же тема. Так же со стороны маньяка. 4 адреналина и прочее. Это не вина игроков, а скорее разрабов. Гемплей на красных рангах за суров скатывается тупо в генраш, ибо если ты не успел завести, то вы сосете. Так что будьте готовы к бомбежке из-за кемпинга,туннелинга и генраша. А проще говоря, не идите дальше 10-го ранга, ниже разнообразия - нет. Я предупредил.
jogo bom....mas faltou finalizacoes.

El juego en sí esta bien pero le falta que cuando juegues con amigos te deriven otra vez al mismo grupo no que te pongan de forma individual, un formato de mejora en las rankeds para que sea mas competitivo y otra para la gente que solo quiera jugar normales para entretenarse por lo demas bien aunque de vez en cuando te encuentras algún camper.
Recomiendo comprarlo si lo juegas con amigos sino no lo hagas.

lol

这游戏越更新越烂，更新到现在几乎可以说更新都是偏向生还者。如果4位高等MMR好友一起在线都是会玩的玩家，老实说杀手很难追到，10分钟内五台发电机修完四钩以下。外加现在很多中国恶心🤢的玩家在亚服开外挂破坏了游戏体验（幼稚想法的人就爱永远想赢，不懂得什么叫挑战和享受游戏过程，那么干嘛不去玩单机游戏？）。这游戏我18年开始玩到现在5年了，以前几乎没有外挂现在如果玩杀手每10场至少有3-4场会遇到生还者偷调跑步速度（偷调不多以为别人不会发现，但我老玩家了还是能容易察觉），无限恢复体力，瞬间移动等。感觉也是时候删除了。

ตั้งแต่ปรับ 1.9.4 มา ทำให้เซอแม่มแร็งขึ้นยาก มันก็ส่งผลให้คิลเลอร์แร็งสูง ๆ แม้งไม่มีเซอเข้าห้องสๅสส เอาระบบแร็งออกไปเหอะสัส แร็ง 1 จบไปกี่ซีซั่นแล้วก็ไม่รู้ ไม่ได้ห่าไรเลย มีรางวัลตอนรีแร็งกูจะไม่ว่าเลยสัส เสียรม
運営、マッチング、バランス全てにおいて価値無し
Very stupid rank system. Toxic community. Endless waiting for other players. Possible loss of progress. High price. Pretty bad job so far.

我买这个游戏，纯粹是为了以中国人的形式向开发商道歉，我国不要脸的网易做出这种事情，希望不要对中国人都抱有这种失望的态度。中国是对版权仍然不尊重的国家，从上到下，但是年轻人们（虽然我85年）对版权越来越尊重，也希望开发商能继续做出好游戏，也感谢你们对汉化的之处。

-----

PS：真的没想玩，就上来看看人物和故事，然后……一晚上一直在玩……第五人格已经卸载……

-----
7小时后补充！这么恐怖的游戏太暖了！正能量传染啊！

我当求生者只剩下我自己了，都绝望了，结果屠夫等我修机、开门，还帮我完成成就，目送我离开。

当我开始玩电锯的时候，同样也是最后一个人留下送走，好像默默的达成了共识，真的好游戏气氛啊！

感谢那些放我一条生路的屠夫们，然后我放走的那些求生者们，不客气。
